name: Touchscreen-Tablet
concept: Compact touchscreen tablet with minimal physical controls
prompt:
Design a VibeDeck controller as a compact touchscreen tablet device.

Features:
- 5-inch capacitive touchscreen as the main interface
- Screen shows customizable grid of touch buttons and sliders
- Thin tablet form factor (iPad mini inspired)
- Slim aluminum bezels around screen
- Two physical buttons on right edge (confirm/cancel)
- One small rotary encoder on top edge for quick scrolling
- USB-C port on bottom
- Optional kickstand on back for angled desktop use
- Dark space gray aluminum body

Style: Professional product photography, clean studio lighting, device at slight angle showing both screen content and thin profile, neutral background. Premium Apple-like aesthetic.
design_rationale: Touchscreen offers maximum flexibility - interface can be completely customized via software. Tests if physical controls are essential or if touch-first approach is viable.
